freedays.title: Free Days Calculation
freedays.description: A full-stack web application built with <0>Next.js</0>, enabling users to log in via <1>form authentication</1> or <1>Google login</1>. Logged-in users can mark their free days on a calendar, and the system ranks the most common free days among all users using <2>MongoDB</2>.

features.login: Secure Login with Google or email/password
features.calendar: Select free days via an interactive calendar
features.stats: See most common free days among all users
features.tech: Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB
